description: Auxiliary sequence for calculation of number of even permutations of degree n and order exactly 4.
references: V. Jovovic, Some combinatorial characteristics of symmetric and alternating groups (in Russian), Belgrade, 1980, unpublished.
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_
extensions: More terms from Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)lycos.com), Apr 05 2003
